song.title: Convinction (Edit)
song.info: Oldskool trance action done in co-op with Bass-Cadet here. Original done around 1997 and this edited version rescued from cassette (only existing copy) for Kindergarden 2005 Hi-Quality Music Compo. Made with A4000 running Octamed Soundstudio, Roland D5 and Eko P15. This version cut from the restored cassette version.
